hero.title: Track Calories
hero.description: Meet Calz – the AI-powered app that makes calorie tracking effortless. Snap a photo or scan a barcode, and instantly get calories, nutrients, and personalized tips. Stay on track with smart reminders and reach your goals, hassle-free.

howItWorks.title: How Does Calz Work?
howItWorks.description: It's as simple as snapping a picture. Calz uses your phone's depth sensor to estimate the volume of your food. Then, our AI — trained on thousands of meal images — identifies each part of your dish and figures out their proportions. Finally, our powerful multimodal model analyzes it all to deliver detailed nutritional info: calories, protein, carbs, fat, and more.

accuracy.title: How Accurate Is Calz?
accuracy.description: Calz is about 90% accurate in most cases. Complex meals with many ingredients might be slightly less accurate, but you can always use our Describe feature or barcode or label scanner for packaged foods. If something looks off, use our "Fix results" option to help us improve!
